buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

capReached().details: Checks whether the cap has been reached.

claimRefund(address).details: Investors can claim refunds here if crowdsale is unsuccessful.

finalize().details: Must be called after crowdsale ends, to do some extra finalization work. Calls the contract's finalization function.

finalized().return: true if the crowdsale is finalized, false otherwise.

getUserContribution(address).details: returns the amount contributed by a specific user

goal().return: minimum amount of funds to be raised in wei.

goalReached().details: Checks whether funding goal was reached.

hasClosed().details: Checks whether the period in which the crowdsale is open has already elapsed.

isOpen().return: true if the crowdsale is open, false otherwise.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

rate().return: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCrowdsaleStage(uint256).details: Allows admin to update crowdsale stages.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

wallet().return: the address where funds are collected.
